questions.question: My best friend lives ________________ Boretz Road.
I'll be ready to leave ________________ about twenty minutes.
Since he met his new girlfriend, Juan never seems to be ________________ home.
My parents have been married ________________ forty-nine years.
My best friend, John, is named ________________ his great-grandfather.
Why are prepositions useful in writing?
choice: They add details to your writing.
You cannot have a complete sentence without prepositions.
They contain the action of the sentence.

questions.question:
Which pair of words is the preposition and object of the preposition in the following sentence?
She roasted her marshmallow over the fire.

Find the preposition.
Will you be home for a long time?

We sat ________________ the bench.
Which preposition fits in the blank?

The bright stars sparkled ________________ me.
Which preposition fits best in the blank?
